testsuite.name: login.PasswordFieldTest
testsuite.system-out: Browser: chrome Language: english Login Role: super admin TC_passwordEyeIconEnable Testcase execution Started em>"This method verifies entered Password is displayed in encrypted format by default in Login screen" Performed click action on Password field Entered text "InfoAdmin" in the Password field Performed click action on Eye icon field The password is displayed by default in encrypted format TC_passwordEyeIconEnable Testcase execution Completed

Browser: chrome Language: english Login Role: super admin TC_passwordSpace Testcase execution Started "This method verifies Login screen Password field by entering Spaces" Performed click action on Password field Entered text "ÓÄç" in the Password field Performed click action on Login button field Required error message is displayed TC_passwordSpace Testcase execution Completed

Browser: chrome Language: english Login Role: super admin TC_passwordNumeric Testcase execution Started "This method verifies Login screen Password field for the Numeric characters" Performed click action on Password field Entered text "123456" in the Password field Performed click action on Login button field Numeric characters are allowed in the password text field TC_passwordNumeric Testcase execution Completed

Browser: chrome Language: english Login Role: super admin TC_passwordSpecialChar Testcase execution Started "This method verifies Login screen Password field for the Special characters" Performed click action on Password field Entered text "!@*$%^" in the Password field Performed click action on Login button field Special characters are allowed in the password text field TC_passwordSpecialChar Testcase execution Completed

Browser: chrome Language: english Login Role: super admin TC_passwordMinimumLength Testcase execution Started "This method verifies Login screen Password field for the minimum character length" Performed click action on Password field Entered text "inf" in the Password field Performed click action on Login button field Password must be greater than 5 characters error message is displayed TC_passwordMinimumLength Testcase execution Completed

Browser: chrome Language: english Login Role: super admin TC_passwordAlpha Testcase execution Started "This method verifies Login screen Password field for the Alphabetic characters" Performed click action on Password field Entered text "InfoAdmin" in the Password field Performed click action on Login button field Alpha characters are allowed in the password text field TC_passwordAlpha Testcase execution Completed

Browser: chrome Language: english Login Role: super admin TC_passwordPlaceholderText Testcase execution Started "This method verifies password field Placeholder text" Password* Password field placeholder text is not displayed TC_passwordPlaceholderText Testcase execution Completed

Browser: chrome Language: english Login Role: super admin TC_passwordMaximumLength Testcase execution Started "This method verifies Login screen Password field for the maximum character length" Performed click action on Password field Entered text "1234567890123456" in the Password field Performed click action on Login button field Password must be less than 16 characters error message is displayed TC_passwordMaximumLength Testcase execution Completed

Browser: chrome Language: english Login Role: super admin TC_passwordEmpty Testcase execution Started "This method verifies error message for the empty Password in the Login screen" Performed click action on Password field Entered text "" in the Password field Performed click action on Login button field Required error message is displayed TC_passwordEmpty Testcase execution Completed

Browser: chrome Language: english Login Role: super admin TC_passwordEyeIconDisable Testcase execution Started "This method verifies entered Password is displayed in Plain text format on disabling View icon in Login screen" Performed click action on Password field Entered text "InfoAdmin" in the Password field Performed click action on Eye icon field Password is displayed in plain text in the password field TC_passwordEyeIconDisable Testcase execution Completed
